Name: Verify Adding Dress to Cart on Women s Category Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the women's category. Add a dress to the cart and verify the category products page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink women
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink dress > navigate to Page category products
step 4: At Page category products, click on hyperlink add to cart
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page category products

Name: Verify Viewing Cart after Adding Dress from Women s Category Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the women's category. Add a dress to the cart and view the cart to verify the cart page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink women
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink dress > navigate to Page category products
step 4: At Page category products, click on hyperlink cart > navigate to Page view cart
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page view cart

Name: Verify Brand Products for Madame in the Products Section
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the products section. View the product details and navigate to the brand products for Madame. Verify the Madame brand products page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink products > navigate to Page products
step 3: At Page products, click on hyperlink view product > navigate to Page product details
step 4: At Page product details, click on hyperlink 5 madame > navigate to Page brand products Madame
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page brand products Madame

Name: Verify Product Details after Adding to Cart from Product Details Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the products section. View the product details and add the product to the cart. Verify the product details page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink products > navigate to Page products
step 3: At Page products, click on hyperlink view product > navigate to Page product details
step 4: At Page product details, click on button add to cart
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page product details

Name: Verify Products Page after Navigating from API Testing
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the API list. View the details for getting all products and navigate to the products page. Verify the products page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink api testing > navigate to Page api list
step 3: At Page api list, click on hyperlink api 1 get all products list
step 4: At Page api list, click on hyperlink products > navigate to Page products
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page products

Name: Verify Viewing Cart from Home Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the cart to verify the cart page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink cart > navigate to Page view cart
step 3: Add visual checkpoint at Page view cart
